Mass. Drug Lab scandal

Who is ex-chemist Annie Dookhan?

As a youth, Annie Dookhan was quiet and stood out for her school work. But those familiar with her are struggling to reconcile the woman they knew with the chemist accused of falsifying criminal drug tests. (AP, 12:04 p.m.)
